data.description: Check the grammar of Irish language text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a new Perl implementation of my Irish (Gaelic) grammar
    checker "An Gramad√≥ir" -- previous versions (through 0.4) were an
    ugly mixture of C, bash, sed, awk, and perl. See
    http://borel.slu.edu/gramadoir for these. I prefer
    Lingua::GA::Gramadoir for the namespace over, say,
    Lingua::GA::Grammar or the like (clearer for the intended audience).
